xuiListview
directive in module xui

Description

XUI ListView component. Supports row/list-item toast highlighting via ToastService.

Usage

as element:
<xui-listview
       name="{string}"
       items-source="{object []}"
       stripe="{boolean}"
       empty-data="{IEmptyData}"
       [show-empty="{boolean}"]
       template-url="{string}"
       template-fn="{function}"
       selection-mode="{ListSelectionModeEnum}"
       selection-property="{string}"
       [selection-invert]="{boolean}"
       [track-by]="{string}"
       selection="{object []|object}"
       [controller]="{any}"
       row-padding="{string="regular"}"
       highlight-text="{string}">
</xui-listview>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
namestring

The name of the element.

items-sourceobject []

List of items {name, value, $templateUrl}.

stripeboolean

Whether the rows should be striped.

empty-dataIEmptyData

Empty data parameters object

show-empty
(optional)
boolean

Show empty state or not(Hiding empty state before data is loaded for example)

template-urlstring

Parameter specifying common URL for templates if none is provided by the item.

template-fnfunction

(item:any)=>string function returning template based on given item.

selection-modeListSelectionModeEnum

Can be "single", "radio" or "multi". Use "multi" to display checkboxes on every row. "Radio" has the same behavior than "single" but adds radio buttons

(default: disabled)

selection-propertystring

Property of item that will be used for selection model.

[selection-invert]boolean

Whether inner checkboxes should display inverted values. Related only to selection-mode='multi'.

[track-by]string

The property name that would be used for tracking by ngRepeat. If no value is specified, or the property does not exist on the item, the auto-generated value by Angular hashing will be used as the key.

selectionobject []object

Selected rows/collection.

[controller]any

Controller used in a template.

row-paddingstring="regular"

Determines the padding of the row around the content. Options are: 'regular' (15px), 'narrow' (15px; 7px), 'compact' ( 5px; 7px), or 'none' (0px).

(default: 'regular')

highlightTextstring

Value holder for text highlight in search used by other components

Example

Example that demonstrates basic bindings via the xui-listview directive.
